Meeting with Jilin City friendship delegation 
    Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with the Jilin City friendship delegation of China was held at the Changdok School in Pyongyang on Feb. 28.   Present on invitation was the delegation headed by secretary Tian Xueren of the Jilin City Committee of the Communist Party of China.    Present at the meeting were vice-chairman choe Jong Hwan of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is vice-chairman of the c.c., the DPRK-China Friendship Association and principal, teachers, employees and students of the Changdok School.   The participants enjoyed an art performance by art circle members of the school and exchanged conversations, deepening feelings of friendship.

Congratulations on Bulgarian National Day
   Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK today sent a message of greetings to President Peter Stoyanov on the Bulgarian National Day.   The message extended warm congratulations to the President and people of Bulgaria and expressed belief that the relations between the DPRK  and Bulgaria would develop.   Meanwhile, Hong Song Nam, premier of the cabinet, and Paek Nam Sun, Minister of Foreign Affairs, respectively sent messages of greetings to their counterparts Ivan Kostov and Nadezhda Mihailova.

Gift to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, March 1 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru.   Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the front who is on visit to Korea, conveyed the gift to secretary Choe Thae Bok of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
